original_text: while I stood between the Lord and you at that time, to declare to you the word of the Lord. For you were afraid because of the fire, and you did not go up into the mountain. He said:
korean_text: 그 때에 너희가 불을 두려워하여 산에 오르지 못하므로 내가 여호와와 너희 중간에 서서 여호와의 말씀을 너희에게 전하였노라 여호와께서 이르시되

sentences.original_text: while I stood between the Lord and you at that time
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 내가 주와 너희 사이에 서 있을 때에

sentences.original_text: to declare to you the word of the Lord
For you were afraid because of the fire
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 너희가 불 때문에 두려워하였기 때문이요

sentences.original_text: and you did not go up into the mountain
